title: Mickey Takes the Pills | AHS: Double Feature - Episode 2: "Pale" (HQ Clip)
author: AHS Crave
comment: Out of all the characters we’ve met in this season so far, I’m definitely the most invested in these two. This was such a well acted scene and to top it off, it’s accompanied by a wonderfully mournful score.
I love how he still treated her like a human being flaws and all.
I cried when she saw her paintings she looked so happy love Sarah Paulson
I was worried we wouldn’t have anyone to root for in the beginning since the main trio don’t exactly have clear goals yet, but these two, dayum.

This season is so good so far. The cinematography, writing, acting, and score is top notch. Im lowkey sad we are only getting 6 episodes of this part. I want a whole season of this. There is so much to explore here. This is one of the best scenes in AHS history only in ep 2. I want to continue this story.
description: "Pale", the second episode of American Horror Story: Double Feature (Part 1 - Red Tide) - written by Brad Falchuk & Ryan Murphy, directed by Loni Peristere - stars Sarah Paulson as Tuberculosis Karen, Evan Peters as Austin Sommers, Lily Rabe as Doris Gardener, Finn Wittrock as Harry Gardener, Ryan Kiera Armstrong as Alma Gardener, Frances Conroy as Belle Noir, Billie Lourd as Lark, Leslie Grossman as Ursula, Adina Porter as Chief Burelson, Angelica Ross as The Chemist, Macaulay Culkin as Mickey, Denis O'Hare as Holden, and Robin Weigert as Martha. All rights belong to FX Networks and Ryan Murphy Television.
